# IBM Quantum Platform Documentation

IBM Quantum Platform Documentation

- Guides
- Tutorials
- API reference
  - Qiskit SDK
  - Qiskit Runtime
  - Qiskit Transpiler Service
  - Qiskit addons
  - Error code registry
- migration guides
- Community
  - Open-source resourcces
  - Qiskit ecosystem
  - Support

## Links

- [Approximate quantum compilation (AQC-Tensor) API documentation (latest version)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qiskit/documentation/refs/heads/main/docs/api/qiskit-addon-aqc-tensor/index.mdx): Index of all the modules in the latest version of qiskit-addon-aqc-tensor.
- [Circuit cutting API documentation (latest version)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qiskit/documentation/refs/heads/main/docs/api/qiskit-addon-cutting/index.mdx): Index of all the modules in the latest version of qiskit-addon-cutting.
- [Multi-product formulas (MPF) API documentation (latest version)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qiskit/documentation/refs/heads/main/docs/api/qiskit-addon-mpf/index.mdx): Index of all the modules in the latest version of qiskit-addon-mpf.
- [Operator backpropagation (OBP) API documentation (latest version)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qiskit/documentation/refs/heads/main/docs/api/qiskit-addon-obp/index.mdx): Index of all the modules in the latest version of qiskit-addon-obp.
- [Sample-based quantum diagonalization (SQD) API documentation (latest version)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qiskit/documentation/refs/heads/main/docs/api/qiskit-addon-sqd/index.mdx): Index of all the modules in the latest version of qiskit-addon-sqd.
- [Qiskit addon utilities API documentation (latest version)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qiskit/documentation/refs/heads/main/docs/api/qiskit-addon-utils/index.mdx): Index of all the modules in the latest version of qiskit-addon-utils.
- [Qiskit SDK C API API documentation (latest version)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qiskit/documentation/refs/heads/main/docs/api/qiskit-c/index.mdx): Index of all the modules in the latest version of qiskit-c.
- [Qiskit Runtime client API documentation (latest version)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qiskit/documentation/refs/heads/main/docs/api/qiskit-ibm-runtime/index.mdx): Index of all the modules in the latest version of qiskit-ibm-runtime.
- [Qiskit Transpiler Service API documentation (latest version)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qiskit/documentation/refs/heads/main/docs/api/qiskit-ibm-transpiler/index.mdx): Index of all the modules in the latest version of qiskit-ibm-transpiler.
- [Qiskit SDK API documentation (latest version)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qiskit/documentation/refs/heads/main/docs/api/qiskit/index.mdx): Index of all the modules in the latest version of qiskit.
- [Qiskit SDK release notes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qiskit/documentation/refs/heads/main/docs/api/qiskit/release-notes/index.mdx): New features, bug fixes, and other changes in previous versions of Qiskit SDK.
- [Overview](https://quantum.cloud.ibm.com/docs/guides/llms.txt): Find resources to use Qiskit, Qiskit Runtime, IBM Quantum, and more
- [Tutorials](https://quantum.cloud.ibm.com/docs/tutorials/llms.txt): Browse tutorials on workflows toward advantage or Qiskit capabilities, and learn how to use Qiskit for common use cases.
